steps.name: a registered user with an active subscription
the user logs in
the user visits the my account page
the user cancels their subscription
the subscription status should be set to pending cancellation
the user should receive a subscription cancellation email
the recurly subscription should be canceled
a registered user with an active subscription
an admin user with access to their info
the admin user visits the admin page
logs in as an admin
performs an immediate cancellation on the user account
the subscription should have a status of CANCELED in the admin panel
the user account should reflect the cancellation
the recurly subscription should be expired

elements.name: Subscriber cancels an anime crate subscription

steps.name: a registered user with an active anime subscription
the user logs in
the user visits the my account page
the user cancels their subscription
the subscription status should be set to pending cancellation
the user should receive an anime cancellation email
the recurly subscription should be canceled

elements.name: Change from US to International Country and verify pricing.

steps.name: an unregistered user
the user visits the signup page
the user submits valid signup information
the user visits the lootcrate_subscribe page
the user sets their country to Colombia
the Colombia price for all plans should be displayed

elements.name: Change from US to International Country and verify pricing.

steps.name: an unregistered user
the user visits the signup page
the user submits valid signup information
the user visits the lootcrate_subscribe page
the user sets their country to Czech Republic
the Czech Republic price for all plans should be displayed

elements.name: A user with an active subscription can add an international six month accessory subscription

steps.name: a registered user with a Denmark address
the user logs in

comments.value: #And The accessory level up product is available

steps.name: the user sets their country to Denmark
the user selects the Level Up crate
the user selects a level up six month subscription for the accessory crate
the user submits valid subscription information
the new level up subscription should be added to the user account
the user should receive a level up email
recurly should have a matching international subscription

elements.name: A user without an active subscription can add a one month shirt subscription

steps.name: a registered user with no prior subscription
the user logs in
the user selects the Level Up crate
the user selects a level up one month subscription for the level-up-tshirt crate
the user submits valid subscription information
the new level up subscription should be added to the user account
the user should receive a level up email

elements.name: A user without an active subscription can add a three month bundle subscription

steps.name: a registered user with no prior subscription
the user logs in
the user selects the Level Up crate
the user selects a level up three month subscription for the level-up-bundle-socks-wearable crate
the user submits valid subscription information
the new level up subscription should be added to the user account
the user should receive a level up email
